title: Vrunda Tol
text:
Hi there, Welcome to my website!
I’m Vrunda (pronounced as vroo-n-thaa, /vrʊn-ðɑː/). I am enthusiastic about learning, innovating, and communicating about environmental solutions with a strong focus on clean energy transition, sustainable supply chains, and decarbonization.

title: About
text: I am a sustainability professional, passionate about solving climate challenges, particularly driving the clean energy transition, decarbonization, and circularity in semiconductor tech and EV battery industries. Starting my career with a background in chemistry and electrical and electronics engineering from BITS-Pilani, I navigated to environmental sustainability with a Master’s in Environmental Science and Management at the Bren School of Environment, UC Santa Barbara. I learn about new climate solutions and career skills everyday at the Bren community and the larger sustainability network. Join me in my journey as I share my learning outcomes in this space!
